mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of the Wheeling School Patrol on the steps of the Capitol building
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Members of Wheeling's School Boy patrol take time off from a tour of Washington, D.C. for a brief rest on the steps of the nation's Captiol and to greet First District Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. (bottom right).
